---
title: "Log File Viewer"
format: html
params:
  files: 
    - file
execute:
  echo: false
resource_files:
- logs/*
---

```{r setup}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(reactable)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(purrr)
library(glue)
library(tibble)
library(htmltools)

# Function to read last n lines of a file
read_log_lines <- function(file_path) {
  if (!file.exists(file_path)) {
    return(tibble(Line = "File not found"))
  }
  
  # Read all lines
  lines <- readLines(file_path)
  
  # Create tibble with line numbers
  tibble(
    Line_Number = seq_along(lines),
    Content = lines
  )
}

output_log <- function(file_name) {
  log_file <- glue("logs/{file_name}.log")
  
  # Read and display the log file
  log_data <- read_log_lines(log_file)
  
  reactable(
    log_data,
    searchable = TRUE,
    defaultPageSize = 10,
    columns = list(
      Line_Number = colDef(
        name = "Line",
        width = 50,
        align = "right"
      ),
      Content = colDef(
        name = "Log Content"
      )
    ),
    theme = reactableTheme(
      searchInputStyle = list(width = "100%"),
      style = list(fontSize = "0.8rem"),
      headerStyle = list(fontSize = "0.8rem")
    )
  )
}
```

```{r}
#| label: dev
#| echo: false
# set params default for development mode if it is not set
if (!exists("params")) {
  params <- list(
    files = c("diag-server", "diag-system")
  )
}
```



```{r}
#| label: all_logs

# Display all log files
tagList(
  map(params$files, function(file) {
    tagList(
      h3(file),
      output_log(file)
    )
  })
)
```
